item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, August 28, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Diffusion Models Are Real-Time Game Engines (675 points | 193 comments)
2. Microsoft donates the Mono Project to the Wine team (1164 points | 365 comments)
3. The journey of an internet packet: Exploring networks with traceroute (23 points | 1 comment)
4. Wp2hugo: Best WordPress to Hugo migrator (written in Go) (50 points | 8 comments)
5. Formal CHERI: rigorous engineering and design-time proof of full-scale architect (5 points | discuss)
6. Cosmic Alpha Released (119 points | 59 comments)
7. Prosper AI (YC S23) Is Hiring a Founding Front End Engineer in Barcelona(hybrid) ( | hide)
8. Show HN: IPA, a GUI for exploring inner details of PDF (Rust) (9 points | discuss)
9. Final two communications from MH370 support controlled descent scenario (2021) (80 points | 60 comments)
10. A Collection of Free Public APIs That Is Tested Daily (439 points | 90 comments)
11. Faster CRDTs (2021) (275 points | 85 comments)
12. Boxxy puts bad Linux applications in a box with only their files (80 points | 56 comments)
13. The Monospace Web (442 points | 122 comments)
14. A dishwasher can make or break a restaurant (5 points | discuss)
15. Tesla's TTPoE at Hot Chips 2024: Replacing TCP for Low Latency Applications (110 points | 54 comments)
16. ChartDB – Free and open source, database design editor (174 points | 14 comments)
17. Blitzortung – real time lightning strikes around the world (264 points | 106 comments)
18. Sainsbury Wing contractors find 1990 letter from donor (316 points | 101 comments)
19. Rerun: Visualize Multimodal Data over Time (92 points | 18 comments)

21. How to verify boot firmware integrity if you prioritize neutralizing Intel ME? (18 points | 16 comments)
22. Sapiens: Foundation for Human Vision Models (12 points | discuss)
23. Taskwarrior – CLI Task Management (144 points | 57 comments)
24. Namibia to cull 83 elephants and distribute meat to people affected by drought (13 points | discuss)
25. Microsoft backports AMD branch prediction improvement to Windows 11 23H2 (10 points | discuss)
26. Detecting diamonds with X-ray technology(2014) (12 points | 3 comments)
27. Rust Dylib Rabbit Holes (34 points | 6 comments)
28. Launch HN: Bucket Robotics (YC S24) – Defect detection for molded and cast parts (101 points | 22 comments)
29. Covid-19 Intranasal Vaccine (131 points | 103 comments)
30. The Simple Algorithm That Ants Use to Build Bridges (2018) (103 points | 27 comments)
